name: BuyTheSlice
description: Buy the Slice ($BTS) is a community-driven meme coin created to support Dave Portnoyâ€™s mission of saving local pizza shops and small businesses. 100% of the trading fees generated by $BTS are sent to Dave via Bags FM, with the community rallying behind his efforts to give back to small business owners. The token combines crypto culture with real-world impact, turning meme coin enthusiasm into meaningful support for local communities.
